comments.purpose: This package.json tracks CDN dependencies for security scanning only.
comments.deployment: Dependencies are loaded via CDN using Import Maps (see index.html).

comments.updates: Use 'npm outdated' to check for available updates, then update versions in both package.json and the import map in index.html.
